# C++ B3 Binary Order Entry Handler - Sample Projects

This directory contains the following sample projects:

1. [**GettingStarted**](GettingStarted/README.md) - a console
    application that connects to the pre-defined host and port. When the
    session is established, the `'NewOrderSingle'` SBE
    message is sent to the counterparty.
2. [**TCPDirectGettingStarted**](TCPDirectGettingStarted/README.md) - a console
    application that connects to the pre-defined host and port using Solarflare TCPDirect technology.
    When the session is established, the `'NewOrderSingle')` SBE
    message is sent to the counterparty.
3. [**SbeLogDecoder**](SbeLogDecoder/README.md) - a console
    application that demonstrates how to convert the Base64 encoded
    \*.summary file into a human-friendly \*.txt file.
4. [**Benchmark**](Benchmark/README.md) - a console application that
    demonstrates how to measure the latency and use the warm-up feature
    properly.
5. [**TCPDirectBenchmark**](TCPDirectBenchmark/README.md) - a console application that
    demonstrates how to measure the latency and use the warm-up feature
    properly using Solarflare TCPDirect technology.
6. [**SessionScheduler**](SessionScheduler/README.md) - a console application
    that demonstrates all aspects of the session scheduler functionality.
7. [**ThreadPoolMode**](ThreadPoolMode/README.md) - a console application that
    demonstrates how to use the `ThreadPool` threading model properly.
8. [**TradingClient**](TradingClient/README.md) - an advanced interactive console
    application to send orders and receive responses.
9. [**PluggableStorage**](PluggableStorage/README.md) - a console
    application that demonstrates how to use a pluggable session storage.
10. [**ExternalThreadMode**](ExternalThreadMode/README.md) - a console application that
    demonstrates how to use the `ExternalThread` threading model.
